comments:
I20060830-1650

- check out org.eclipse.core.expressions
- open ElementHandler.java
- context menu > Team > Show Annotations, click Yes, click OK
- ruler context menu > Revisions > Show Id
- try to scroll down to the end of file

=> IAEs are thrown when I touch the scroll bar or move the mouse over the change ruler. Dragging the scrollbar does not repaint the editor and rulers correctly.
